metadata.title: CVE-2017-11554 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There is a stack consumption vulnerability in the lex function inparser.hpp (as used in sassc) in LibSass 3.4.5. A crafted input will leadto a remote denial of service.

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
